Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes procurement goals for New York state food products purchased by state agencies
Summary: Establishes a procurement goal that at least fifteen percent of all food and food products purchased by state agencies shall be New York state food products in the first and second year after such law takes effect, at least twenty percent in the third year and twenty-five percent thereafter.
LawCode: Add ยง163-c, amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing procurement goals for the purchase of New York state food products by state agencies
